directions: Mix confectioners' sugar, powdered milk, processed cheese food, butter, cocoa powder, walnuts, and vanilla extract in a large bowl with a stand mixer using the dough hook attachment until mixture is blended. The mixture will seem dry at first; continue mixing until smooth.
Press cheese mixture into a large baking sheet. Refrigerate until set, about 1 hour.
ingredients: 1 (1 pound) loaf processed cheese food (such as Velveeta®), cubed
1/4 cup chopped walnuts, or to taste (optional)
title: No Cookin' Necessary Cheese Fudge
